div.strong: Consolidated electric has installed free WIFI to the HS parking lot.

div.div: Anyone can park in the lot and use the connection to this network. Look for Consolidated Free Wifi. Once you click it will take you to a page where you have to agree to their acceptable user policy and then you are connected to the internet. Be aware that this connection is filtered so some webpages may not be accessible. Thank you to Consolidated Electric who is providing this internet access and also paid all costs to install the equipment to make this possible.
